desc: Hand sanitizer is an essential for every day and everywhere — and OLIKA believes that every essential should be clean, delightful, and sustainable. We’re evolving past single-use, goopy gels. Our hydrating, misting hand sanitizer keeps you and your family safe, so you can connect with the world around you.

layout.text: Sanitize and quench dry hands with an ultra-hydrating formula featuring hyaluronic acid + reishi mushroom
